body:
Comment 4: 
It looks to me that DNS resolver does not work properly, because you cleared gotour
process environment. As far as I remember, we had similar problems with go builder, and
here https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/misc/dashboard/builder/main.go#431 is
what we do now. My suggestion is just leave environment along on windows - rewrite
environment variables you need to rewrite, and copy the rest as is.

Alex
